_desc.NAICS_DESCRIPTION: Other Chemical and Allied Products Merchant Wholesalers

_exec_summary.SummaryText:
The Airgas facility in Doral, Florida is owned and operated by Airgas USA, LLC. The Facility is a chemical distribution plant, which stores, sells, and repackages industrial gases.



In accordance with the EPA's RMP regulations (40 CFR Part 68), the facility inventory of chemicals was evaluated to determine if any regulated flammable or toxic substances were found to be stored in quantities above the EPA threshold quantities . Based on the facility inventory, the following listed flammable substances are stored by the Facility in quantities above the substance's EPA threshold quantity:



Acetylene gas (CAS #74-86-2)



In the last five years, there have been no major accidents associated with the process. Accidental release prevention and emergency response policies for the stationary sources include safe operating procedures and a well trained workforce, along with an emergency action/response plan.



At this time, there are no planned changes for safety, however should opportunities to improve safety become available, the facility will thoroughly review the feasibility of such a change.



Administrative controls and mitigation measures used to limit the distances for the worst and alternative case scenarios include implementation of a Process Safety Management Plan, and the use of relief valves.



Airgas USA, LLC has developed and implemented a Program 3 Risk Management Plan for the above identified processes, as described in this Submittal. All documents pertaining to the RMP are kept on-site and updated as required.
